(2004) 93 min   -  Documentary
Previously unreleased material outlines the campaign against Bill Clinton's presidency, from his days in Arkansas up to his impeachment trial. 
Directors: Nickolas Perry, Harry Thomason 
Writers: Joe Conason (book), Gene Lyons (book), 2 more credits » 
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Jonathan Alter, Steve Barnes
